rows.label: qst300410_msg0002
rows.name:
I wanted to visit Vandham-san's
grave with you now.

rows.label: qst300410_msg0004
rows.name:
It was only after you were
gone that I realized how
much I relied on you.

rows.label: qst300410_msg0005
rows.name:
Coordinating jobs, procuring food,
managing people, and taking care
of us...[ML:Dash ] the list is endless.

rows.label: qst300410_msg0006
rows.name:
I was at a loss at first...[ML:Dash ] but by
working together with everyone, we've
somehow managed to make it work!

rows.label: qst300410_msg0008
rows.name:
I have no memory of
fighting with you now...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst300410_msg0009
rows.name:
But seeing the villagers
and Rex and the others, I
know you were a fine man.

rows.label: qst300410_msg0010
rows.name:
It's not about carrying on your
will, but in my own way, I intend
to protect them...[ML:Dash ] Rest easy.

rows.label: qst300410_msg0011
rows.name:
We... are the same as the
Merc Group when the old
man was around...[ML:Dash ] No,

rows.label: qst300410_msg0012
rows.name:
we've become an even stronger
and better Merc Group!

rows.label: qst300410_msg0013
rows.name:
Don't worry about us.
Please rest in peace.

rows.label: qst300410_msg0014
rows.name: The Rex you chose is now a fine leader!

rows.label: qst300410_msg0015
rows.name:
All right, that should be
enough to reach him, right?

rows.label: qst300410_msg0016
rows.name:
Thank you for coming with
me. We wanted to find
closure in our own way.

rows.label: qst300410_msg0017
rows.name:
We're counting on you from now on,
leader of the Hr√¶svelgr Merc Group
